text:
Ian Cognito (born Paul Barbieri, 21 November 1958 – 11 April 2019) was an English stand-up comedian. Many said his comedy was like Lenny Bruce, Bill Hicks, and Jerry Sadowitz but had success in the mainstream media because of his short temper.
Cognito won the Time Out Award for Stand-up Comedy in 1999.
Cognito died on 11 April 2019 of a heart attack during a comedy gig in Bicester. He was 60.
